description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, providing basic endpoints such as root access, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for a notes backend application, including health check, documentation redirection, and informational endpoints.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root URL is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI for API documentation, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application, typically used for monitoring.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application, such as its name.
